2.6.6  New More Compact Mesh Object & Solid Mesh

mesh2, the new mesh syntax is designed for use in conversion from other file formats. Flat and smooth triangles can be used in the same mesh, uv_coordinates are supported, also the possibility to specify a texture for a single triangle. When written to file, the size will be smaller than that of the 'normal' mesh. A mesh2 will parse faster.

Solid mesh are now available in POV-Ray, this means that mesh can be used in CSG-objects. All that is needed, is to specify an inside_vector and a closed mesh object.
